13476.「……ああ <pc>さん 私です！\n リュナンです！: Oh, <pc>! It's me! It's me, Lunan!

13477.「次に連絡するときは メギドロームを\n 倒した後と 決めていたのですが……\n:
I wanted to contact you again after I had
defeated Megidrome...but that's no longer
the case.

13478.「じつは オーグリード大陸のランガーオ山地の\n 東の果てで 奴のアジトを 発見:
I've managed to find his hideout. It's in the
far reaches of the Langao Mountains in Ogreed.
It's called the Snowfield Ruins!

13479.「……で そこまでは よかったんですが\n メギドロームは つねに 手下を連れて:
...But Megidrome always has his henchmen by
his side. I don't think I'll be able to beat
him if I'm by myself.

13480.「ご迷惑ばかりかけて 申し訳ないのですが\n どうか ここまで来て\n 私に 協:
I apologize to ask for such a troublesome
thing, but...do you think you could come
there and help me?

13481.「おお ありがとうございます！\n あなたには 何度 助けられたことか……\n:
Oh, thank you, thank you! I've lost count of
the number of times you've helped me...
I truly cannot thank you enough.

13482.「メギドロームのアジトは オーグリード大陸\n ランガーオ山地の東部にある 雪原:
Megidrome's hideout lies in the eastern part
of Ogreed's Landon Mountains, inside the
Snowfield Ruins. Please come quickly!

13483.「その時こそ あなたの前に\n 私の姿を 見せることになるでしょう。:
It is there that you will finally be able to
see me.

13484.「よかった！……と言いたいところですが\n あなたは 今 たくさんの頼まれごとを:
Thank goodness! ...However, it seems you're a
tad busy with other requests right now.

13485.「メギドロームのアジトに 突入するのは\n しばらく 待ちますから\n 先に 頼:
I'll hold off on infiltrating Megidrome's
hideout for the time being. Please take care
of your other matters first.

13487.「それでも もし……もし 少しでも\n 私を 助けてくれてもいいと思ったなら\n:
Still, if... If you think you are able to help
me, please speak with the mirror once
more.

13489.「もしかして メギドロームを倒すのを\n 手伝ってほしいという 私の頼み\n 引:
Perhaps you've decided to help me in defeating
Megidrome?

13491.「だが 大いなるチカラを手に入れた\n 我の敵では なかったな。\n この程度で:
But you were simply no match for my great
power. This was barely a warm-up.

13493.「ちょうどいい。貴様には\n 我が 大いなるチカラを試すための\n 試金石となっ:
Perfect timing. You shall serve as the
benchmark for testing my awesome power.

13494.「ほう。こりずに また来たのか。: Oh, ho... So you've come back.

13495.「うれしいぞ。この大いなるチカラを\n まだ 試させてくれるというのだな。\n:
How delightful. You still wish for me to test
this great power, do you? Very well. Come
at me!

13498.「あぶないところでした。\n メギドロームの手下が <cs_pchero>さんを:
That was close. One of Megidrome's henchmen
snuck up from behind you.

13500.「……そうです。私が 魔法使いリュナンです。: Yes, that's right... I am Lunan.

13501.「おどろくのも 無理はありません。\n 自分が 今まで 話していた相手の正体が\:
It's no surprise that you're frightened. You had no idea that the person you were talking to all this time was actually a
monster...

13502.「それにしても さすがは <cs_pchero>さん。\n あのメギドロームを:
Even still, I had no doubt in my mind that you
would be able to defeat Megidrome. I'm
impressed.

13503.「何か お礼をしたいのですが\n ミラクルゾーン以上のものとなると\n もはや:
I would love nothing more than to thank you,
but I'm afraid I have nothing more to bestow
upon you...

13504.「そうだ！ 私のお古になってしまいますが\n どうか これを 受け取ってください:
Oh, that's right! It may be a hand-me-down,
but please take this!

13505.「魔法とは 善も悪もない ただのチカラ。\n それをどう使うかは 術者次第なので:
Magic is neither good nor evil, it is simply
power. How a mage uses that power is
up to them.

13506.「私は ねこまどう界の天才術師として\n 魔法使いの証を 授けられましたが\n:
As a genius amongst the Meowgicians, I was
given this proof of a Mager Achievement.
You are the one who deserves it.

13507.「たいしたものは 差しあげられませんが\n お礼に これでも もらってください。: I know it isn't much, but please take this.

13508.「ハハハ……。\n あなたほどの大魔法使いへの お礼には\n ふさわしくないかも:
Hahaha... Perhaps this is not a worthy reward
for a great mage such as yourself.

13509.「……ええ。\n 私にとっては <cs_pchero>さんが\n 理想の 魔法使: Yes... To me, you are the ideal mage.

13510.「偶然とはいえ あなたと 友人……\n そう思って いいでしょう？……になれて\:
Even if it was simply by chance, it feels like
we've become friends, don't you think...?
I am truly happy about that.

13511.「一度は うれしさのあまり\n 直接 会おうとしたこともありましたっけ。\n す:
Because of my sheer happiness, I tried meeting
with you once. I immediately regretted it,
though.

13512.「なにしろ あなたは <cs_pchero_race>。私は 魔物。\n こうし:
After all, you are <cs_pchero_race>, and
I am a monster. I was afraid that if you knew,
it would ruin our relationship.

13514.「……<cs_pchero>さん。\n ひとつ聞かせてください。:
<cs_pchero>...
Allow me to ask you just one thing.

13515.「私の正体を知った 今。\n これからも あなたは 私のことを\n 友人だと 思:
Now that you know who I truly am...
Will you still consider me as your friend?<yesno><close>

13516.「もし ウソだとしても うれしいですよ。\n あなたと知り合えて 本当に よかっ:
Even if it's a lie, I'm happy. I'm truly glad
to have met you...

13517.「今の返事を聞いて 勇気づけられました。\n おかげで 決心がつきましたよ。:
Your answer has encouraged me. I've finally
made up my mind.

13518.「メギドロームのように 私の秘術をねらう者が\n また いつ 現れないとも限りま:
There may be others like Megidrome who will
come after me for my magic. That's why I've
decided to go on a journey of my own.

13519.「旅に出て もっと 自分をきたえて……\n あなたのような 理想の魔法使いを\n:
I plan to go on this journey...to further hone
my skills and myself, and to one day become
an ideal mage, just like you.

13520.「それまでは シーバの鏡での連絡も\n 取らないことにしますよ。あれが あると\:
Until then, I will refrain from using the
Mirror of Sheba to communicate. I fear that
I will just rely on it too much.

13521.「……では しばしの お別れです。\n どうか お元気で <cs_pchero>:
So, for now, this is goodbye.
Please take care of yourself, <pc>!

13522.「……そうですか。聞けてよかったです。\n おかげで 決心がつきましたよ。:
...I see. I'm glad to hear that.
I've now made up my mind.

13523.「メギドロームのように 私の秘術をねらう者が\n また いつ 現れないとも限りま:
There may be others like Megidrome who will
come after me for my magic. That's why I've
decided to go on a journey of my own.

13524.「旅に出て もっと 自分をきたえて……\n あなたのような 理想の魔法使いを\n:
I plan to go on this journey...to further hone
my skills and myself, and to one day become
an ideal mage, just like you.

13525.「これからは シーバの鏡での連絡も\n 取らないことにしますよ。\n もう 甘え:
Until then, I will refrain from using the
Mirror of Sheba to communicate. I mustn't
rely on it any longer.

13526.「……では これで お別れです。\n どうか お元気で <cs_pchero>さ:
...Well, this is goodbye. Please take care
<cs_pchero>!

13528.「……ああ 通じてよかった。\n <pc>さん 私です！\n リュナンです！:
Ah, good, it came through!
It's me! It's me, Lunan!

13529.「もしかして おどろかせてしまいましたか？\n 連絡は取らないと 言っていたのに:
Did I scare you, perhaps? I did say I wouldn't
be contacting you, so I'm sure you must
be wondering what's going on.

13530.「じつは 今後しばらくの落ち着き先が\n 決まったので そのことを\n お伝えし:
I've actually decided where I'll be settling
down for the time being, and I thought I'd
tell you.

13531.「ウェナ諸島にある ジュレー島の南西には\n 猫島という ネコ系モンスターばかり:
Southwest of Jule Island of the Wena Islands is a place called Cat Island. As the name implies, it's an island inhabited by all sorts
of cat-like monsters.

13532.「ここなら 仲間も たくさんいるので\n また メギドロームのような奴が現れても:
I've made lots of new companions here. If
someone like Megidrome decides to show their
face here, I'm certain they'll help me.

13533.「もちろん そういつまでも\n ひとに 守ってもらっているつもりは\n ありませ:
Of course, I don't intend to rely on others to
protect me forever, you know.

13534.「ここで 修行に打ち込んで いつか\n 自分の身は 自分で守れる\n 大魔法使い:
I plan to devote myself to my training here,
and one day become a great mage who can
take care of himself.

13536.「それまでは この島に来てもらっても\n 私が 姿を現すことはないので\n ご理:
Until then, please understand that if you
happen to come to the island, I will not be
available.

13537.「では 今度こそ お別れです。\n 修業を終えて ムネを張って\n 再会できる日:
Well, this is goodbye for now. I look forward to the day we can meet again, after I've completed my training and I can face you
with a heart full of confidence.

28624.「バ バカな……ありえぬっ！\n 大いなるチカラを手に入れた 我が\n 敗れるな:
T...that's impossible! I, who had gained
this great power, defeated...? C...Curse
you...

29698.「魔法使いリュナン……\n 我が弟子を 倒すとは さすが\n 秘術の継承者といっ:
Lunan, the mage... You are indeed the heir to
the mystic arts if you were able to defeat my
apprentice.

41556.<pc>は 鏡のある客室に 泊まった。:
<pc> stayed in a room containing
a mirror.
